StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPersonView2]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @star.ngRow int = 1, @PageSize int = 15, @FirstName varchar(20) = null, @LastName varchar(20) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null )
AS
IF (@FirstName = '%' AND @LastName = '%' AND @SSN = '%') BEGIN
SELECT NULL AS RowNumber, NULL AS NWA_ID, NULL AS Original_NWA_ID, NULL AS FIRST_NAME, NULL AS MIDDLE_NAME, NULL AS LAST_NAME, NULL AS SUFFIX, NULL AS SSN, NULL AS RS, NULL AS RSS, NULL AS Status, NULL AS Disposi.on, NULL AS [Date], NULL AS [Type] WHERE 1 = 2
END ELSE BEGIN --This will return one more row that they asked for so that they know if there is another page of data. DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @star.ngRow + @PageSize
DECLARE @Sor.ngTable TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, NWA_ID INT NOT NULL, Original_NWA_ID INT NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT NULL, SSN CHAR(9) NULL, RS varchar(100) NULL, RSS varchar(100) NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SUFFIX VARCHAR(5) NULL, Status VARCHAR(40) NULL, Disposi.on VARCHAR(40) NULL, [Date] DateTime, [Type] char(1), Contract_id INT NULL, Contract_Begin_Date DateTime, Ship_Date DateTime, Discharge_Date DateTime, Gradua.on_Date DateTime, MCRD_Discharge_Date DateTime, NWA_Declared_Date DateTime)
DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, NWA_ID INT NOT NULL, Original_NWA_ID INT NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT NULL, SSN CHAR(9) NULL, RS varchar(100) NULL, RSS varchar(100) NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SUFFIX VARCHAR(5) NULL, Status VARCHAR(40) NULL, Disposi.on VARCHAR(40) NULL, [Date] DateTime, [Type] char(1), Contract_id INT NULL, Contract_Begin_Date DateTime, Ship_Date DateTime, Discharge_Date DateTime, Gradua.on_Date DateTime, MCRD_Discharge_Date DateTime, NWA_Declared_Date DateTime)
INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable (RowNumber, NWA_ID, Original_NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, SSN, RS, RSS, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), NWA_ID, Original_NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, null, null, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dbo.PERSON p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA n on p.Person_ID = n.Marine_Candidate_ID WHERE (@SSN is null OR SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER like @SSN) AND (@LastName is null OR LAST_NAME like @LastName) AND (@FirstName is null OR FIRST_NAME like @FirstName)
INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT * FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
UPDATE @Grid SET n.[Type] = cns.STATUS_Type, n.Status = cns.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, n.Disposi.on = cns.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, n.Date = cns.Status_e.ec.ve_date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN vwCurrentNwaStatus cns on n.NWA_ID = cns.NWA_ID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.RS = case when n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID != 910 then rs.[name] when n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = 910 then rss.[short_name] end , n.RSS = rss.[Name] FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN Recrui.ng_Organiza.on rss on n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = rss.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP om ON rss.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rs ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = rs.ORGANIZATION_ID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.Contract_Begin_Date = c.Contract_Begin_Date, n.Contract_id = c.Contract_id FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN [Contract] c on n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.Ship_Date = s.Ship_Date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN [Shipper] s on n.Contract_id = s.Contract_id
UPDATE @Grid SET n.Discharge_Date = c.Discharge_Date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN [Contract] c on n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.Gradua.on_Date = r.Gradua.on_Date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN Contract c on c.Contract_id = n.Contract_id INNER JOIN Shipper s on s.Contract_id = n.contract_id INNER JOIN [RECRUIT_TRAINING] r on r.ship_id = s.ship_id
UPDATE @Grid SET n.MCRD_Discharge_Date = r.Drop_Date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN Contract c on c.Contract_id = n.Contract_id INNER JOIN Shipper s on s.Contract_id = n.contract_id INNER JOIN [RECRUIT_TRAINING] r on r.ship_id = s.ship_id
UPDATE @Grid SET n.NWA_Declared_Date = a.NWA_Declared_Date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN NWA a on a.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID
SELECT RowNumber, NWA_ID, Original_NWA_ID, ISNULL(FIRST_NAME, '') as FIRST_NAME, ISNULL(MIDDLE_NAME, '') as MIDDLE_NAME, ISNULL(LAST_NAME, '') as LAST_NAME, ISNULL(SUFFIX, '') as SUFFIX, ISNULL(SSN, '') as SSN, ISNULL(RS, '') as RS, ISNULL(RSS, '') as RSS, ISNULL(Status, '') as Status, ISNULL(Disposi.on, '') as Disposi.on, [Date] = CASE Status WHEN ltrim('Contract') THEN CASE Disposi.on WHEN ltrim('DEP DISCHARGE') then Discharge_Date ELSE Contract_Begin_Date END WHEN ltrim('Shipper') THEN CASE Disposi.on WHEN ltrim('Graduate') THEN Gradua.on_Date WHEN ltrim('MCRD Discharge') THEN MCRD_Discharge_Date ELSE Ship_Date END ELSE NWA_Declared_Date END, [Type] FROM @Grid WHERE NOT (Status = 'NWA' AND Disposi.on = 'PENDING APPROVAL')
END
